org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.utils.indextree.treenodes

Class SingleWildcardNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.utils.indextree.treenodes.BasicTreeNode
      • org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.utils.indextree.treenodes.SingleWildcardNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TreeNode

    public class SingleWildcardNode
extends BasicTreeNode
    Wildcard tree node that will match any character except for '#' and '?', and any character where the previous character was a '/'.
    Author:
    apforrest

      boolean hasInterestIn(char value, SearchContext context)
      Evaluates whether this tree node has interest in the passed character.
      boolean isWildcard()
      A wildcard node can match more than one simultaneous characters of a given resource URL and potentially from a set of different characters.
